author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #40790

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_13_0_X`.

This PR includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2592](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2592): [TSG] removal of deprecated GRun Paths post Run2022 (combined table unchanged)
  - [CMSHLT-2593](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2593): [TSG] remove unused Paths from HLT combined menu (post Run2022)
  - [CMSHLT-2596](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2596): [TSG] split EGamma,JetMET,Muon datasets and streams by 2
  - [CMSHLT-2605](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2605): [GEM] extend RPCMON stream to GEM
  - [CMSHLT-2607](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2607): [PPS] extend list of CT-PPS FEDs
  - [CMSHLT-2613](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2613): [EGM] added two MC_Egamma_Open Paths (only to combined table)
  - [CMSHLT-2633](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2633): [EXO] update of displaced Photon+PFHT trigger and addition of backups

It also includes the migration of the HLT menus ("Fake*", frozen, and development ones) to the `ConfDB` template for `CMSSW_13_0_0_pre4`.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#40790

Development of HLT menus for 2023 data-taking and Run-3 MC.
title: HLT menu development for `13_0_X` (2/N)
